title: Onstar Sales Business Manager (Level 7)
description:
Job Description

Communication

Become the main point of contact for OnStar related issues between Dealership, GM and OnStar team. Keep close communication with Sales Managers, General Managers and Service Managers of the dealerships to solve questions or comments about OnStar Operation.Communicate on time and effectively the Onstar Objectives, plans and service improvements to Dealerships in order to ensure an appropriate knowledge and execution of actions, programs and strategies define by OnStar. Organize and coordinate meetings between OnStar team and Dealerships to improve performance. Develop a strong and confident relationship with dealership management in order to improve OnStar appraisal and performance at the Dealership. 


Performance Measure

Follow up the OnStar KPI´s to determine opportunity areas at the Dealership.  Create action plans together with dealerships to ensure appropriate Onstar KPI´s levels. Provide OnStar Management reports of the activities carried out at the Dealerships in order to improve its performance Ensure the compliance of goal set for Dealerships regarding to Enrollments, Pre-Enrollments and customer registration. Define monthly plans and agendas to visit dealers according to their impact and potential for OnStar performance. Reduce the cancelation rate of OnStar packages at dealers. Generate and implement incentive programs to increase OnStar sales at Dealers. Develop OnStar sales program for all Dealer segments; new, pre-owned and service lane. 


Operation Support

Identify dealership training needs and work together with dealership management in its improvement. Provide support to dealerships to solve issues related to daily operation Supervise the right use of pop material or training materials at the dealership sales floor. Keep a stretch communication with OnStar Marketing management and Sales management to provide feedback of the opportunities identified on field. Generate reporting dashboards to track dealer’s performance. Operate dealer incentive programs to secure right and timely payments. 


Knowledge / Experience

4+ years of experienceSubscription model experience Experience in the car businessOEM or dealership, New Car sales experienceGeneral Automotive product knowledge Desire experience in Subscription Companies


Skills

High level of interpersonal skills to work effectively with others High level of communication skills High level of analytical ability where problems are complex Proactively reacts to changes Excellent problem solving skills to develop alternative solutions 


Experience/Education: 

Bacheloor Degree


Competencies:

Communication Interpersonal Savvy Motivating others Presentation skills Drive for results Managing and Measuring Work Perseverance Problem solving

Job Description:

Coordinates work share with other regional partners relative to creation and development of dimensional reports using Siemens Dimensional Planning & Validation (DPV) software. These reports are utilized to present data information for CMM, vision, handheld, and scanning inspection routines in a user-friendly manner and posted in the Global Dimensional Information System (GDIS) to support dimensional activities during launch of new vehicle programs and steady state.

Monitor manufacturing dimensional data flow for plants assigned closely, troubleshoot and resolve data flow issues in a timely manner. Works closely with Launch team, Plant personnel, and suppliers to ensure timely completion of projects.

Monitor, prioritize and respond to Plant Requests for updates, corrections, maintenance issues, new data flow routines & create reports for the web.

Partners with technical customers to support analysis of data and solve issues.

Provides technical assistance and training to use DPV software/analysis tools, GDIS, and General Motors business process and standards for flowing dimensional data and creation of various standard web based dimensional reports.

Actively support the teams improvement of business tools and processes related to DPV and business processes to support dimensional data flow and report creation.

Support global Teamcenter and DPV software testing events (Coordination with IT, Development) including, but not limited to, defining the scope, develop and write test cases for an international audience.

Develop SME skillset in Siemens DPV Reporting and Analysis toolset (Teamcenter DPV concepts, Factorylink, SSRS, TCC).

Ingenieria mecatrónica, manufactura, industrial, ingeniero en sistemas, tecnologia

Inglés Intermedio-Avanzaro hablado y escrito

Experiencia 1-3 años

Experiencia en manejo de base de datos, análisis de información

Conocimiento en procesos de manufactura

Manejo de office creación de macros, power bi

Conocimiento básico en GD&T

description:
Job Description

Híbrido: Esta posición requiere trabajar 3 días en sitio y dos desde casa a tiempo completo.

Que vas a hacer:

El objetivo principal es plantear estrategias de marketing para maximizar el tamaño y rentabilidad de la base de suscriptores de OnStar.Pasión por entender las necesidades de los clientes así como capacidad de traducir esa información en recomendaciones prácticas que impulsen mejoras en la experiencia del cliente.Habilidad para trabajar en colaboración con varias áreas incluyendo: Mercadotecnia, Ventas, desarrollo de puntos de venta, Investigación de Mercado, Análisis de precios y promociones y Tecnología de Información.Habilidades para resolver problemas de forma estructurada. Colaborará con los líderes de las unidades de negocio para recopilar y convertir datos en información imparcial, objetiva, cuantitativa y práctica para la efectiva toma de decisiones. Capaz de resumir información compleja y modelos analíticos para apoyar la ejecución y el monitoreo de los resultados clave. 


Additional Job Description

Knowledge: 

Análisis de Marketing, bases de datos de marketing y estrategias de CRM.Análisis y estrategia de precios y rentabilidad para los distintos segmentos de consumidores a través de su ciclo de vida.Conocimiento de ciclo de adquisición, retención y fidelización en estrategia de Marketing.Analizar e interpretar los resultados analíticos y aportar recomendaciones estratégicas.Analizar las bases de datos de clientes a gran escala y evaluar los resultados de los programas de marketing.Diseñar e implementar herramientas interactivas en integración con el equipo de analytics de US que permitan visualizar la información viva a través de Power BI, Tableau y SQL.
